text: Erile fa moleperwa a ntse a tsamaya mo tseleng a simolola go goeletsa mafoko a a molemo a gore o fodile. Mme yare ka ntlha ya moo, bontsi jwa batho jwa dikaganyetsa Jesu gore a ba a retelelwe ke go tsena mo motseng, mme a tshwanelwa ke go nna kwa ntle mo sekakeng. Mme batho ba tswa gongwe le gongwe ba tla kwa go ene.
